data.comment: The match has been interrupted.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal! Vicente Besuijen gives Den Haag a 0-1 lead in Emmen.
In the minute 6, Lassana Faye instrumental with a fine assist.
Kees de Boer (Den Haag) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Emmen.
Den Haag have kicked-off the second half at De Oude Meerdijk.
Dick Lukkien is making the team's first substitution at De Oude Meerdijk with Lucas Bernadou replacing Hilal Ben Moussa.
In the minute 55, Michael de Leeuw for Emmen has been booked by Jeroen Manschot and receives a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Michiel Kramer with Nikos Karelis. This is the first substitution made today by Ruud Brood.
Ruud Brood (Den Haag) is making a second substitution, with Samy Bourard replacing Ricardo Kishna.
In the minute 67, Dante Rigo is replacing Kees de Boer for Den Haag at De Oude Meerdijk.
Ruud Brood is making the team's fourth substitution at De Oude Meerdijk with Andrei Ratiu replacing Bilal Ould-Chikh.
Miguel Araujo equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
In the minute 72, That's a fine assist from Glenn Bijl.
Donis Avdijaj is replacing Ricardo Van Rhijn for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
Keziah Veendorp (Emmen) has replaced the possibly injured Nick Bakker.
In the minute 86, Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a fourth substitution, with Anco Jansen replacing Nikolai Laursen.
Michael Chacon is on a sub for Marko Kolar for Emmen.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Amar Catic is replacing Vicente Besuijen for the away team.
